title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of modern marketing technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The concept of marketing is ages old. It’s just with time that the techniques have changed and today even technology is involved with marketing. However, like a coin, there are advantages and disadvantages as well. Advantages: 1. Stimulates the development of healthy competition due to increased transparency. 2. Access to multi-buyer scenarios as monitoring every activity becomes very easy 3. Helps in being more well-organized marketers due to augmented knowledge 4. Makes customers experience with the brand a better one as interaction with customers increases 5. A scope to increase customer services which helps to bring in more customers Disadvantages: 1. Confidentiality must be monitored always since privacy of customers personal data must be ethically maintained 2. Marketing techniques are easily copied as competition to be successful is very high 3. Lack of trust in customers due to increased number of scams as these platforms are mushrooming everyday 4. Investments sometimes go high due to continuous evolution in technology 5. Increased reliability on technology which might bring downfall if the system crashes
